channel.title: Client Update Issue
channel.description:
Okay, so I am using a 614 server I believe, and I can get the server running just fine. I went into launch.Java and changed the IP to 127.0.0.1 so I can just test the server myself. So anyway, like I said, the server will come up and appear to run normally, but when I try running the client it just sits at "Connecting to Update server". Is there something that I missed/forgot to do?
Sorry if this is a noob question, I'm really new at this :/

item.title: Client Update Issue
item.dc:creator: @talontantalize talontantalize
item.description:

So anyway, like I said, the server will come up and appear to run normally, but when I try running the client it just sits at “Connecting to Update server”. Is there something that I missed/forgot to do?

Sorry if this is a noob question, I’m really new at this
